mapper.sql: patient_msg_id, msg_topic_id, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_phone, patient_id_card, patient_type, area_code,send_type,id_card,inhos_no,open_id, patient_status
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `leanin_msg_patient` WHERE send_type = 1 AND msg_topic_id = #{msgTopicId}
mapper.insert: insert into leanin_msg_patient (patient_msg_id, msg_topic_id, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_phone, patient_id_card, patient_type, area_code,send_type) values (#{patientMsgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{msgTopicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patientAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update leanin_msg_patient
msg_topic_id = #{record.msgTopicId},
patient_id = #{record.patientId},
patient_name = #{record.patientName},
patient_sex = #{record.patientSex},
patient_age = #{record.patientAge},
patient_phone = #{record.patientPhone},
patient_id_card = #{record.patientIdCard},
patient_type = #{record.patientType},
area_code = #{record.areaCode},
send_type = #{record.sendType},
id_card = #{record.idCard},
inhos_no =#{record.inhosNo},
open_id =#{record.openId},
patient_status =#{record.patientStatus},
where patient_msg_id = #{record.patientMsgId}

update leanin_msg_patient set msg_topic_id = #{msgTopicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_sex = #{patientSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_age = #{patientAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_id_card = #{patientIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_type = #{patientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} send_type = #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where patient_msg_id = #{patientMsgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
